boardgame.name: Discoveries
Discoveries: The Journals of Lewis and Clark
Odkrycia
boardgame.description: The Lewis and Clark Expedition, which was commissioned in 1803 and ended in 1806, was the first party of men that went through the North American continent, then returned. During these three years, the leaders Meriwether Lewis and William Clark, along with Sergeant Gass and Sergeant Ordway, wrote page after page about their trip, describing the new plants and animals species they discovered and drawing the maps of unknown areas._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Discoveries, you play one of the Expedition members: Lewis, Clark, Gass or Ordway. Your goal is to compile as much knowledge as possible in your journal, and in this way advance science thanks to your discoveries._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Tribe/Discoveries cards you gain during the game score discovery points at the end. To get these cards, you have to perform exploration actions, and to do this you use dice. On your turn, you either:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Play the dice in your action area or on the game board; by doing this, you prepare or perform the exploration, change your dice, or get new possible actions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Get dice back from the game board or from your opponents' action areas._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2015 Golden Geek Best Board Game Artwork/Presentation Nominee

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups

***PRE-ORDER - Expected in stock Thursday 11th June*** -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Ginger Games - Great Games, Great Service www.gingergames.co.uk Postage

Our returns policy can be found at www.gingergames.co.uk
New In Shrink.

In shrink. Direct bank transfer is the best way to pay. Take a look at any of my other games on sale to bundle an order and save on postage. Pickup available in St Ives. Postage is: $10 to Sydney address $15 to other NSW, Qld, Vic, ACT $20 to WA, SA, NT or Tasmania

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** DISCOVERIES JOURNALS OF LEWIS AND CLARK: $27.95 Asmodee Editions [ASM DIS01] Publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Anticipated Release Date: September 2015 *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** SHIPPING Continental U.S. - $13.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - TBD

Very good condition except for the back of the game box with a significant dent - hence _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; rating. See photos. Direct bank transfer is the best way to pay. Check out my other games to bundle an order and save on postage. I usually get the package in the post the day after purchase. I must emphasise that I take extra care to package in a sturdy box with packing protection, however I accept no responsibility for the package once it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in the hands of Auspost. If you have a wild postal contractor who likes to hurl boxes AFL style at your front door then please let me know to organise signature on delivery. (Likewise if you live in a building where you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re not prepared to take the risk of Auspost leaving a parcel at the front door.) No refunds for damage or loss in transit. All parcels come with a tracking number. If you require extra insurance then let me know and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll arrange it. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve sold hundreds of games using Auspost and only once had a problem with damage to a game. Local pickup in St Ives is available.
Only to be sold to: jobin13

Asmodee (ASMDIS01) Lewis and Clark are joined by John Ordway and Patrick Gass in their expedition to find the Pacific coast. Players will take on the role of the famous explorers as they plot new routes, negotiate with American Indian tribes and record their adventures in their field journals. The more exciting your journey, the more points you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll earn at the end of the game. This dice rolling strategy story builds on Lewis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Clark The Expedition. Combine your dice to complete objectives or steal your opponents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; dice and use them for your goals.
